ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent users from changing DoA related fields once DoA process is completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( /* Exempt System/Admin users */ NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(Contains($Profile.Name,"Finance")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"),
/* Block changes on DoA fields after DoA is finalized */ OR( ISPICKVAL(DoA_Approval_Status__c, "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(DoA_Approval_Status__c, "Not Required") ), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(ARR__c))) && ROUND(PRIORVALUE(ARR__c), 8) <> ROUND(ARR__c, 8), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(One_off__c))) && ROUND(PRIORVALUE(One_off__c), 8) <> ROUND(One_off__c, 8), ISCHANGED(Paymet_Period__c), ISCHANGED(Invoice_Period__c), ISCHANGED(Waive_Indexation__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change DoA related fields (Product prices/quantities, Invoice Period, Payment Period,Waive Indexation) once DoA process is approved. If you need to change these information, click â€œUnlock Prices & Terms" button to clear the current DoA.
